amendment.description: At the end of the bill (and before the short title) insert the following: SEC.__. None of the funds provided by this Act may be obligated for the purpose of closing the regional field offices of the Antitrust Division of the Department of Justice.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be obligated for the purpose of closing the regional field offices of the Antitrust Division of the Department of Justice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lewis (GA) amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 235 (Roll no. 239).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lewis (GA) amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 235 (Roll no. 239).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Lewis (GA).
